# Intimacy Wellness Morocco

> Premier store bien-être intime au Maroc. Livraison discrète et rapide.

## About

Intimacy Wellness Morocco is the leading intimate wellness e-commerce platform in Morocco. We offer a curated selection of premium intimate care products, including lubricants, condoms, intimate hygiene gels, and wellness items from trusted brands like Manix, Durex, Cumlaude Lab, and more.

## Site Structure

- Homepage: https://intimacy.ma
- Shop (all products): https://intimacy.ma/shop
- Education & Guides: https://intimacy.ma/education
- Blog: https://intimacy.ma/blog
- FAQ: https://intimacy.ma/faq
- About: https://intimacy.ma/about

## Product Categories

- **Condoms**: Manix, Durex, Protect, Carex, Mister Size
- **Lubricants**: Manix Gel, Protect Gel, Lubrix, Lubrimax, Sedasteril
- **Intimate Hygiene**: Cumlaude Lab, Novaskin, Soluskin, Dermical, Kemobo, Addax Septidol
- **Massage Oils**: Manix Massage, Manix Skyn Oriental Touch
- **Specialty Care**: Cumlaude Lab Viderage, Mesoestetic Hydragel, Eviana Forintime

## Key Information

- **Currency**: MAD (Moroccan Dirham)
- **Language**: French (primary), English, Arabic
- **Shipping**: Discreet packaging, nationwide delivery across Morocco
- **Location**: Morocco
